rules_text: Rediscover an artifact card, then do the same for creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, and sorcery. [i](Each time, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's of that type. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“This world was robbed of its past. What recompense I can give, I will.”
—Reyhsia[/i]
notes:
RUNUB

I can have a little nine-liner, as a treat
